channel.title: Services and Fees on harmonyhealthclinic
channel.description: Recent content in Services and Fees on harmonyhealthclinic

item.title: Acupuncture Consultation and Personalized Care
item.description: Start with a brief virtual consultation, then mobile acupuncture visits with clear follow-up planning and fair pricing.

item.title: Acute and Chronic Pain Management
item.description: Acupuncture care for musculoskeletal pain, headaches, nerve-related symptoms, and injury recovery.

item.title: Women's Health and Fertility Support
item.description: Holistic acupuncture care for cycle health, fertility, hormonal transitions, and pelvic wellness.

item.title: Digestive and Metabolic Health
item.description: Support for abdominal discomfort, IBS, and metabolic health concerns including cholesterol, weight, and blood sugar balance.

item.title: Respiratory, Immune, and Skin Support
item.description: Acupuncture for allergy, asthma, sinus, cough, skin, and facial nerve concerns.

item.title: Stress, Sleep, and Preventive Wellness
item.description: Whole-person acupuncture care for anxiety, fatigue, insomnia, addiction support, and healthy aging.
